```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)

```

Import the weather data

```{r}

library(p8105.datasets)
data("weather_df")

```

Making our first plot
```{r}

ggplot(weather_df, aes(x = tmin, y =tmax)) +
  geom_point()

```

```{r}

weather_df |>
  ggplot(aes(x = tmin, y = tmax)) +
  geom_point()

```
